body_html:
Also it seems like nobody has really tested this tutorial. I had to write
net = net.to(device)

rather than the suggested:
net.to(device)

in order to get the net loaded onto GPU (which makes more sense since the tensors follow this syntax according to the tutorial).

I would have hoped a little more consistency from the very first tutorial one sees when trying out a new framework... :-(

body:
Also it seems like nobody has really tested this tutorial. I had to write 
net = net.to(device)

rather than the suggested:
net.to(device)

in order to get the net loaded onto GPU (which makes more sense since the tensors follow this syntax according to the tutorial).

I would have hoped a little more consistency from the very first tutorial one sees when trying out a new framework... :-(
